title: 关于中世纪村庄MOD的问题。
author: 顺逆同流
txt_content: 有请达人解答一个村庄的建筑达到上限后是否就不再扩张了？因为我发现村庄居民家里很多孩子而且不再成长，也不会出现新的建筑。

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
村莊有範圍限制... 要擴大範圍必須修改設置文件內容

Q: It says not enough space, what should I do?

A: Are they finished with their previous project?
{C}If yes, exit Minecraft completely and log back in. {C}If they still don't start work after a couple minutes and if there is water near the village, try filling it up to provide space. Do not just cover it.
If "not enough space" is still showing, then do the following:

    exit Minecraft.
    edit "config.txt" in the millenaire folder and change village_radius to 85.
    edit "grosbourg.txt" in the millenaire\buildingplans\villages folder and change the radius to 85.
    edit the hamlet village files in the millenaire\buildingplans\villages folder and change the radius to 65.
    edit the text files in the millenaire\buildingplans\extra folder and change the maxDistance to 85.
    restart Minecraft. 

And if it's still refuses to work, then clear a 50x50 flat space around the townhall.

replies.author: j77o88o
replies.txt_content: 你游戏的时候晚上别去睡觉

replies.author: 顺逆同流
replies.txt_content:
j77o88o 发表于 2011-8-7 21:48 
你游戏的时候晚上别去睡觉
那么多的孩子就是我晚上不睡觉的功劳。
